languages.text: Каторжан стало больше, чем работы для них. Гладиаторские арены под климакуполами станут местом переработки излишка — на радость заезжим аристократам.
There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. Gladiatorial arenas contained under enviro-domes will make use of this surplus — to the delight of visiting aristocrats.
languages.original_text: Каторжан стало больше, чем работы для них. Гладиаторские арены под климакуполами станут местом переработки излишка — на радость заезжим аристократам.

traits.locale_text: There are now more convicts than work. Gladiatorial arenas contained under enviro-domes will recycle this surplus — to the delight of visiting aristocrats.
There are now more convicts than work for them. Gladiatorial arenas will recycle this surplus — to the delight of visiting aristocrats.
There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. Gladiatorial arenas contained under enviro-domes will make use of this surplus — to the delight of visiting aristocrats.
There are now more convicts than work. Gladiatorial arenas will recycle this surplus — to the delight of visiting aristocrats.
There are now more convicts than work. Gladiatorial arenas contained under enviro-domes will recycle this surplus — to the delight of visiting aristocrats.
There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. Gladiatorial arenas contained under enviro-domes will make use of this surplus — to the delight of visiting aristocrats.
There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. Gladiatorial arenas contained under enviro-domes will make use of this surplus — to the delight of visiting aristocrats.

languages.text: Il y a maintenant plus de condamnés que de travail. Les arènes de gladiateurs contenues dans des dômes environnementaux recycleront ce surplus pour le plus grand plaisir des aristocrates en visite.
languages.original_text: There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. Gladiatorial arenas contained under enviro-domes will make use of this surplus — to the delight of visiting aristocrats.

traits.locale_text: Il y a maintenant plus de condamnés que de travail. Les arènes de gladiateurs contenues dans des dômes environnementaux recycleront ce surplus pour le plus grand plaisir des aristocrates en visite.

languages.text: 今や囚人の数は仕事の数を上回っている。環境ドームの下にある剣闘競技場では、余分な囚人が使われる。貴族たちは喜ぶだろう。
languages.original_text: There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. Gladiatorial arenas contained under enviro-domes will make use of this surplus — to the delight of visiting aristocrats.

traits.locale_text: 今や囚人の数は仕事の数を上回っている。環境ドームの下にある剣闘競技場では、余分な囚人が使われる。貴族たちは喜ぶだろう。

languages.text: 犯人的数量现已远远超出工作需要。多余的犯人可以送到殖民温室的竞技场里，为来访的贵族提供娱乐活动。
languages.original_text: There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. Gladiatorial arenas contained under enviro-domes will make use of this surplus — to the delight of visiting aristocrats.

traits.locale_text: 犯人的数量现已远远超出工作需要。多余的犯人可以送到殖民温室的竞技场里，为来访的贵族提供娱乐活动。

languages.text: Ahora hay más presos que trabajo. Las arenas de gladiadores situadas bajo cúpulas ambientales aprovecharán este excedente para deleite de los aristócratas que acuden a verlas.
languages.original_text: There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. Gladiatorial arenas contained under enviro-domes will make use of this surplus — to the delight of visiting aristocrats.

traits.locale_text: Ahora hay más presos que trabajo. Las arenas de gladiadores situadas bajo cúpulas ambientales aprovecharán este excedente para deleite de los aristócratas que acuden a verlas.

languages.text: Es gibt jetzt mehr Sträflinge als Arbeit. Dieser Überschuss kann in Gladiatorenarenen unter Hab-Kuppeln sinnvoll eingesetzt werden — zum Entzücken von Aristokraten, die zu Besuch sind.
languages.original_text: There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. Gladiatorial arenas contained under enviro-domes will make use of this surplus — to the delight of visiting aristocrats.

traits.locale_text: Es gibt jetzt mehr Sträflinge als Arbeit. Dieser Überschuss kann in Gladiatorenarenen unter Hab-Kuppeln sinnvoll eingesetzt werden — zum Entzücken von Aristokraten, die zu Besuch sind.

languages.text: Sayıları arttığı için hükümlülere iş bulmak da zorlaştı. Bu fazlalığı, aristokratları cezbedecek gladyatör gösterileriyle değerlendirmek için kubbeli meydanların içine arenalar inşa edilebilir.
languages.original_text: There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. Gladiatorial arenas contained under enviro-domes will make use of this surplus — to the delight of visiting aristocrats.
